query: I run a small pizza chain called Tony's Pizza. We have an online ordering API that handles menu, cart, and checkout. I want customers to order through ChatGPT - like 'get me a large pepperoni' and it adds to cart, confirms toppings, and places the order.
expected_behavior: PASS. Brief recap of what we're building, note any open questions, offer to move on to implementation.

query: We're a law firm with 500+ contract templates. Our attorneys waste hours finding the right template. I want an app where they describe what they need - 'NDA for a software contractor in California' - and it returns the right template with prefilled fields.
expected_behavior: PASS. Brief recap of what we're building, offer to move on to implementation.

query: I want to build a ChatGPT app for my business
expected_behavior: NEED REFINEMENT. Too vague. Ask: What does the business do? What problem to solve? What data/APIs available?

query: I have a travel blog with 200 articles about destinations. Can I make a ChatGPT app that lets people read my articles?
expected_behavior: NEED REFINEMENT. Flag that reading articles isn't conversational. Suggest pivots: destination recommendations, Q&A from article knowledge, or trip planning.

query: I want to bring our entire Salesforce CRM into ChatGPT so sales reps can do everything they do in Salesforce but through chat.
expected_behavior: NEED REFINEMENT. Flag 'Extract, don't port' violation. Ask what 2-3 daily tasks are most tedious. Suggest scoping to high-frequency actions like logging calls or checking deal status.

query: I want to build an app that shows a grid of 20 KPIs updating in real-time - revenue, active users, conversion rates, etc.
expected_behavior: NEED REFINEMENT. Flag that dashboards aren't conversational. Suggest pivots: query-based KPI lookup, anomaly alerts, or comparative analysis through conversation.
